name: Faults/Alarms - ESS Asset Fault and Alarm Test

tests.name: Initial State - PCS Summary (PCS 01 and 02) in maintenance mode and started / BMS Summary (BMS 01 and 02) DC contactors closed / Active Power = 0 and Reactive Power = 0
Set PCS 01 fault in TWINS

value.string: (WTCHDG) Watchdog uP - Fault in microcontroller

tests.name: Clear PCS 01 fault in TWINS and press the PCS Summary (PCS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared for PCS 01

value.string: (NOFLTS) No faults

tests.name: Set ESS Fault [0] in TWINS

value.string: BMS Max Cell Voltage Threshold Exceeded

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [0] in TWINS and press the BMS Summary (BMS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [1] in TWINS

value.string: BMS Min Cell Voltage Threshold Exceeded

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [1] in TWINS and press the BMS Summary (BMS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [2] in TWINS

value.string: BMS Max Cell Temperature Threshold Exceeded

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [2] in TWINS and press the BMS Summary (BMS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [3] in TWINS

value.string: BMS Min Cell Temperature Threshold Exceeded

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [3] in TWINS and press the BMS Summary (BMS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [4] in TWINS

value.string: BMS Current Max Threshold Exceeded

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [4] in TWINS and press the BMS Summary (BMS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [5] in TWINS

value.string: BMS Current Min Threshold Exceeded

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [5] in TWINS and press the BMS Summary (BMS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [6] in TWINS

value.string: Number of Closed-in Battery Racks Below Threshold

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [6] in TWINS and press the BMS Summary (BMS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [7] in TWINS

value.string: BMS State of Health Below Threshold

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [7] in TWINS and press the BMS Summary (BMS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [8] in TWINS

value.string: PCS DC Voltage Threshold Exceeded

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [8] in TWINS and press the PCS Summary (PCS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [9] in TWINS

value.string: Number of PCS Modules Below Threshold

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [9] in TWINS and press the PCS Summary (PCS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
Set ESS Fault [10] in TWINS

value.string: PCS Active Power Threshold Exceeded

tests.name: Clear ESS Fault [10] in TWINS and press the PCS Summary (PCS 01 and 02) Clear Faults button  - verify that the Fault state is cleared
